mapper.select:
select
from us_user where
UserNo like concat("%",#{userno}"%")
ABC like concat("%",#{abc}"%")
SMSPhone like concat("%",#{smsphone}"%")
Phone like concat("%",#{phone}"%")
DocNum like concat("%",#{docnum}"%")
UserName like concat("%",#{username}"%")
Address like concat("%",#{address}"%")
